Subject: Re: Decepticons hit an run.
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

As Firearm transforms and elevates from the crash site, the gun is aimed at
a disfiguered pink pile of metal, and two arms, one with wires from Firearm
in them, what is left of Beastbox. "Beastbox......hurt" he gurgles in pain,
as he sputters oil, one of his arms elongating to the ground, and
retracting to pull him out of the way. But he is two slow and a blast knock
right besid him, sending the pile of metal soaring.
